title: Globalization Flashcards
description: Flashcards covering various aspects of globalization including economic, cultural, technological, political, and environmental dimensions.

questions.question: What is one of the key components of economic globalization related to international trade?
questions.answer: Trade: Expansion of international trade and the establishment of global markets.

questions.question: What aspect of globalization involves the increase in foreign direct investment and multinational corporations?
questions.answer: Investment: Increase in foreign direct investment (FDI) and multinational corporations (MNCs).

questions.question: Which area of globalization is characterized by global financial markets and the movement of capital across borders?
questions.answer: Finance: Global financial markets and the movement of capital across borders.

questions.question: What does cultural globalization encompass in terms of spreading ideas, values, and cultural products?
questions.answer: Cultural Exchange: Spread of ideas, values, and cultural products (e.g., films, music, food).

questions.question: What phenomenon in cultural globalization refers to the mixing and blending of different cultures?
questions.answer: Cultural Hybridization: Mixing and blending of different cultures, leading to new cultural forms.
